name: The Monster Game
description:
The Monster Game is a Card-based Role Playing Game where you slay monsters, find loot, use spells, use potions, and utilize powerful professions to race your opponents to level 10. Take turns entering The Monster Game dungeon and challenging whatever monster you encounter.

Equip a Viking Helmet, boxing gloves, a life vest, championship wrestling belt, and bring your trusty Robot companion to slay the mythical Hugicorn!

Over 100 cards ensures no two games are similar. Enjoy unlimited replay value in a highly-strategic tabletop game. Utilize curses, spells, potions, or unique profession abilities to either aid yourself in combat or interfere with your opponents.

Constant updates with new cards, new monsters, and new expansion packs!

KEY FEATURES:

- Professions such as Hunter, Paladin, Wizard with expansion packs for the Necromancer, Pirate, and Ninja. All professions with unique advantages and play styles.

- Races such as the Mermaid, Werewolf, Zombie, and Centaur.

- Armor, Weapon, Helmet, Boots, Belt, and Companion inventory slots. Win loot from defeating monsters and continue to enhance your character in your race for level 10.

- Powerful spells such as Teleport, Mirror Image, and Reverse Time to dramatically impact combat.

- Curses to slow down your opponents.

- Potions to enhance either yourself or a monster while your opponent is in combat.


EXPANSIONS AVAILABLE:

The base game is 100% fully functional. In App Purchases are available to add to the base deck and are completely optional.
